title: Error 404 pls help
body: keeps crashing when i restart tried uninstalling still error 404 dont know what to do please help

replies.body: Where is this happening? In champ select, the website, or somewhere else?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gWqET7Jo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-24T03:11:15.322+0000)
>
> Where is this happening? In champ select, the website, or somewhere else?

when I'm launching the client it starts to update than it just stops (without the update bar moving at all) than an error pops up and it happens every time I start up the client ive tried restarting reinstalling and nothing works

Gotcha. This is very likely caused by a poor connection to the patching servers. Working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) should be able to resolve this issue entirely, so long as it's caused by local network settings.

Let me know if this helped.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gWqET7Jo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-24T03:11:15.322+0000)
>
> Where is this happening? In champ select, the website, or somewhere else?

OMG I MEANT ERROR 004 MY BAD D:
